item.title: Object Help

if(objectID == 2417){ choice("Gamble", "Dont Gamble."); if(playerHasItem(989, 1)) { deleteItem(989, 1); addItem(Item.randomChest(), 1); addItem(4740, misc.random(35)); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); } else sM("You Need A Crystal Key To Use This Chest!"); }
How so Can i Make It That When Someone Click “Gamble” It Does The Following if not it exits?
